name: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat.
Add chopped onion and garlic, sauté until translucent.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it up with a spoon.
Stir in tomato sauce and season with salt, pepper, and herbs.
Simmer the sauce for 20-30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Drain spaghetti and serve with the Bolognese sauce on top.
Garnish with grated Parmesan cheese before serving.
description: A simple and delicious recipe for spaghetti bolognese.

name: Chicken Tikka Masala
steps: Marinate chicken pieces in yogurt and spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or bake the marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a separate pan, sauté chopped onions, garlic, and ginger until soft.
Add tomatoes and cook until they break down into a sauce.
Blend the onion-tomato mixture into a smooth paste.
Return the paste to the pan, add cream and remaining spices.
Add the cooked chicken pieces to the sauce and simmer for 10 minutes.
Garnish with fresh cilantro and serve with naan or rice.
description: A simple and delicious recipe for chicken tikka masala.

name: Sushi Rolls
steps: Cook sushi rice according to package instructions and let it cool.
Prepare vegetables by cutting them into thin matchstick strips.
Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo rolling mat.
Spread a thin layer of rice evenly over the nori, leaving space at the top.
Arrange vegetable strips horizontally across the rice.
Using the mat, tightly roll the nori away from you, applying even pressure.
Wet the top edge of the nori to seal the roll.
Use a sharp knife to cut the roll into 6-8 pieces and serve with soy sauce.
description: A simple and delicious recipe for sushi rolls.
